title: I love it when I'm right
body:
Quote from meddler: I imagine we'll need to buff Yi

Another one:Bloodrazor's looking like it might be too weak, lot of champions its the best choice for are struggling

Me 2 weeks ago: this item is shit yi and shyvana who are the best at the roll they fill will be shit.
All the salty kids: this is fair just learn how to play your noob cause you main yi 
(Yes because maining yi turns me from bronze to plat 2 cause fucking logic)
Riot in the last 3 hours: yeah.... we kind of fucked up... we gonna look for ways to buff yi and shyvana.

I fucking love it when I'm right all you noobs need to learn to stfu. Stuff like yi isn't allowed to be overly weak just because you don't like them. At least not if u want this game to be skill based and if you don't just go play co op vs ai.
https://i.imgsafe.org/7968a91.jpg
Deal with it noobs

replies.body: Okay. Yi is gonna be back and I'm gonna be drinking a bear watching the boards fill with water second it does

>
> Okay. Yi is gonna be back and I'm gonna be ** DRINKING A BEAR** watching the boards fill with water second it does

That typo tho.

{{champion:106}}
I just played Yi (normal - blind)  and  devoured enemy team. I went in as full AS lifesteal champ, was fun.
